topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558755136368725325000a40#post_558755136368725325000a40
It's just a bit of rumor mill, but apparently the anti-gay marriage side has so little legal ground that rumor is that they tried to remove two of the pro-gay marriage justices from the case.


The reason why that is ludicrous is that they effectively tried to make it to where court justices can only rule on cases if they already agree with one side.

It's probably going to be legalized cause the anti side is trying everything legal and not legal to prevent a pro ruling and it's not working.  They're getting desperate.

Tl:dr; it's probably going to be legalized and the anti-gay marriage side is throwing a fit.

topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55875895636872470d001147#post_55875895636872470d001147
Yep. Same sex marriage has always been a weird thing because some states have different minor laws then others but license plates, drivers licenses, and marriage certificates have to be accepted in every state. But some states outlawed same sex marriage. Therefore barring the wedded couple from the marriage benefits they are by all rights legally entitled to. This is taking what States want out of the equation and making same sex marriage a federal thing-

topics.body:
I'm so happy to finally see Same Sex marriage finally being legalized.

Like just yesterday I heard on the news in Morocco these two dudes got 4 months in jail for kissing in public. 

Like, Fuck that shit man. 

Glad shit like that wont happen here now.
